Template.Name: ForeignKeyConstraintTemplate
Template.TemplateData:
ALTER TABLE {0} WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_{1}] FOREIGN KEY({2}) REFERENCES {3} ({4}) GO
ALTER TABLE {0} CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_{1}] GO

Template.Name: CreateIndex
StoredProc
InsertOrUpdateSP
CheckAndInsertSP
Template.TemplateData:
set ANSI_NULLS ON set QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'{1}') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE {1} GO
CREATE PROCEDURE {1} {2} AS BEGIN DECLARE @KEY {7}
SET @KEY = (SELECT TOP 1 {4} FROM {0} where {5})
IF (@KEY is NULL) BEGIN EXEC {6} {3} END ELSE BEGIN SET @{4} = @KEY END END

Template.Name: CreateTable
Template.TemplateData:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
------------------------------------------------------------------- IF EXISTS (SELECT * from sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'{0}') AND type IN (N'U')) DROP TABLE {0} GO
CREATE TABLE {0} ( -- Columns Definition {1} -- Constraints {2} ) ON [PRIMARY] GO

Template.Name: InsertSP
LogGetValue
Template.TemplateData: " EXECUTE [sp_LogGetValues] " + (DT_WSTR,255)@[{0}] + ",? OUTPUT, ? OUTPUT, ? OUTPUT, ? OUTPUT, ? OUTPUT, ? OUTPUT, ? OUTPUT, ? OUTPUT"

Template.Name: LogSelectQuery
Template.TemplateData: IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT TOP(1) {0},{1} FROM {2} ) BEGIN SELECT '-1','-1','{3}','{4}' END ELSE BEGIN SELECT (SELECT TOP(1) CONVERT(nvarchar(255),{0},{5})FROM {2} ORDER BY {0} DESC) AS Source ,(SELECT TOP(1) CONVERT(nvarchar(255),{1},{6})FROM {2} ORDER BY {1} DESC) AS Destination ,'{3}' ,'{4}' END
